title: Anomaly
description: Librarian's Note: this is an alternate cover edition - ASIN: B005OJF0ZCMankind's first contact with an alien intelligence is far more radical than anyone has ever dared imagine. With a technological gap of millions of years, mankind is barely able to recognise the arrival of an alien space craft outside the gates of the United Nations in New York.
author: Peter Cawdron
